resources.string:
NFC App Launcher helps you programming your NFC tags to launch an application.
This is working with Android 4.0 (Ice Cream Sandwich) and higher.

Enter an application package name or clic on "Select Application":
Bring your phone close to a NFC tag to overwrite it.
Select the application you want to record on a NFC Tag:
Select the application you want to record on a NFC Tag:
